1329870.name: Fantasy Grounds - Jans Tokenpack 14 - Goblins
1329870.description:
Jans Tokenpack 14 - Goblins

Goblins are one of my favourite villains in fantasy games. They are mischievous, funny, but can also be mean, and very dangerous in large groups.
The Goblins are not alone, they brought their close relatives, the Hobgoblins. They are meaner, smarter, stronger, and more organized. They are formidable warriors.
More rare, but also even more dangerous are the Bugbears. They love to bully their smaller goblinoid relatives around. These big hairy beasts can wipe out whole parties of adventurers!
I've included Worg wolves that can be used as mounts and pets.
Enjoy this token pack and may your adventures be great!
  • Goblin
  • Goblin Boss
  • Goblin Archer
  • Hobgoblin
  • Hobgoblin Captain
  • Hobgoblin Warlord
  • Hobgoblin Caster
  • Hobgoblin Shadow
  • Hobgoblin Archer
  • Bugbear
  • Bugbear Chief
  • Bugbear Javelin
  • Goblin Jester
  • Worg
  • Rat
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Jan Loos
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
